name: TYMPANOGRAM_DATA
description: Contains all related data for Tympanograms.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TYMP_EAR_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores which ear the Tympanometry procedure was performed

columns.name: TYMP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type of the tympanogram based on the shape of the graph.

columns.name: CANAL_VOLUME
columns.description: Stores the ear canal volume which is measured by the Tympanometer

columns.name: PEAK_PRESSURE
columns.description: Stores the peak pressure for the Tympanogram

columns.name: PEAK_AMPLITUDE
columns.description: Stores the peak amplitude for the Tympanogram

columns.name: BURNED_IMAGE
columns.description: Blob key of burned image of tympanogram drawing
